languages.text: Основные силы бунтовщиков скрывались в удаленных неосвоенных местностях, однако обширное подполье было развернуто и в крупных городах. Приближенные Вистенцы Вьятт настаивали на карательных рейдах, в то время как советники Лорд-капитана предложили развернуть на планете активную пропаганду, которая побудила бы подданных самостоятельно выявить изменников в своих рядах и доложить о них властям. Подобное решение, однако, потребовало бы использования личной казны Лорд-капитана для демонстрации е{mf|го|е} щедрости и покровительства.

traits.locale_text: Основные силы бунтовщиков скрывались в удаленных неосвоенных местностях, однако обширное подполье было развернуто и в крупных городах. Приближенные Вистенцы Вьятт настаивали на карательных рейдах, в то время как советники Лорд-капитана предложили развернуть на планете активную пропаганду, которая побудила бы подданных самостоятельно выявить изменников в своих рядах и доложить о них властям. Подобное решение, однако, потребовало бы использования личной казны Лорд-капитана для демонстрации е{mf|го|е} щедрости и покровительства.

languages.text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.
languages.original_text: Основные силы бунтовщиков скрывались в удаленных неосвоенных местностях, однако обширное подполье было развернуто и в крупных городах. Приближенные Вистенцы Вьятт настаивали на карательных рейдах, в то время как советники Лорд-капитана предложили развернуть на планете активную пропаганду, которая побудила бы подданных самостоятельно выявить изменников в своих рядах и доложить о них властям. Подобное решение, однако, потребовало бы использования личной казны Лорд-капитана для демонстрации е{mf|го|е} щедрости и покровительства.

The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

languages.text: 反乱軍が主に身を隠していたのは未開の僻地だったが、その強固なネットワークは主要都市のいたるところにも張り巡らされていた。ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの部下が懲罰的襲撃で反乱を鎮圧し、その間ロード・キャプテンの相談役が惑星中にプロパガンダを展開し、同じ階級に所属する裏切り者を摘発して当局に報告するよう市民に求めた。しかしながら、プロパガンダにはロード・キャプテンの寛大さを示してと報償を出すために{mf|彼|彼女}の個人資産を用いなくてはならなかった。
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍が主に身を隠していたのは未開の僻地だったが、その強固なネットワークは主要都市のいたるところにも張り巡らされていた。ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの部下が懲罰的襲撃で反乱を鎮圧し、その間ロード・キャプテンの相談役が惑星中にプロパガンダを展開し、同じ階級に所属する裏切り者を摘発して当局に報告するよう市民に求めた。しかしながら、プロパガンダにはロード・キャプテンの寛大さを示してと報償を出すために{mf|彼|彼女}の個人資産を用いなくてはならなかった。

languages.text: 叛军主力藏匿在人迹罕至的偏远地区，但各大城市中均发现了庞大的叛军网络。维丝坦萨·维亚特的盟友要求进行惩戒性突袭，而舰长大人的顾问则建议在整颗行星范围内开展宣传活动，敦促市民揭发身边的叛徒，并向当局举报。不过，这种方法需要动用舰长大人的个人资金，以显示{mf|他|她}的慷慨与赞助。
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

traits.locale_text: 叛军主力藏匿在人迹罕至的偏远地区，但各大城市中均发现了庞大的叛军网络。维丝坦萨·维亚特的盟友要求进行惩戒性突袭，而舰长大人的顾问则建议在整颗行星范围内开展宣传活动，敦促市民揭发身边的叛徒，并向当局举报。不过，这种方法需要动用舰长大人的个人资金，以显示{mf|他|她}的慷慨与赞助。

languages.text: El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes se ocultaba en lugares remotos y salvajes, pero también se habían descubierto grupos clandestinos de resistencia en las grandes ciudades. Los socios de Vistenza Vyatt exigían que se llevaran a cabo redadas punitivas, mientras que los consejeros {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} recomendaron una campaña de propaganda a escala planetaria que apremiase a los ciudadanos a delatar a los traidores ante las autoridades. Esta última estrategia, sin embargo, acarreaba un gasto de los fondos personales {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} en una demostración de apoyo y generosidad.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

traits.locale_text: El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes se ocultaba en lugares remotos y salvajes, pero también se habían descubierto grupos clandestinos de resistencia en las grandes ciudades. Los socios de Vistenza Vyatt exigían que se llevaran a cabo redadas punitivas, mientras que los consejeros {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} recomendaron una campaña de propaganda a escala planetaria que apremiase a los ciudadanos a delatar a los traidores ante las autoridades. Esta última estrategia, sin embargo, acarreaba un gasto de los fondos personales {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán} en una demostración de apoyo y generosidad.

languages.text: Die Hauptstreitkräfte der Rebellen versteckten sich in abgelegenen, nicht kultivierten Gebieten, aber sie hatten auch ein relevantes Netzwerk in den größeren Städten. Die Partner von Vistenza Vyatt drängten zu Strafaktionen, wohingegen die Berater des Lord Captain zu einer planetenweiten Propagandakampagne neigten, um Bürger dazu zu bewegen, die Verräter in ihren Reihen den Behörden zu melden. Der letztere Ansatz jedoch erforderte den Einsatz persönlicher Finanzmittel des Lord Captain, um {mf|seine|ihre} Freigebigkeit und Unterstützung zu demonstrieren.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

traits.locale_text: Die Hauptstreitkräfte der Rebellen versteckten sich in abgelegenen, nicht kultivierten Gebieten, aber sie hatten auch ein relevantes Netzwerk in den größeren Städten. Die Partner von Vistenza Vyatt drängten zu Strafaktionen, wohingegen die Berater des Lord Captain zu einer planetenweiten Propagandakampagne neigten, um Bürger dazu zu bewegen, die Verräter in ihren Reihen den Behörden zu melden. Der letztere Ansatz jedoch erforderte den Einsatz persönlicher Finanzmittel des Lord Captain, um {mf|seine|ihre} Freigebigkeit und Unterstützung zu demonstrieren.

languages.text: Le gros des forces rebelles se cachait dans des lieux éloignés et en friche, mais un réseau de bonne taille put également être mis au jour dans plusieurs grandes villes. Les associés de Vistenza Vyatt tenaient à lancer des assauts punitifs, tandis que les conseillers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} suggéraient d'organiser une campagne de propagande planétaire visant à encourager les citoyens à dénoncer les traîtres aux autorités. Cependant, cette seconde approche nécessiterait que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} fasse preuve de générosité en utilisant ses fonds personnels.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

traits.locale_text: Le gros des forces rebelles se cachait dans des lieux éloignés et en friche, mais un réseau de bonne taille put également être mis au jour dans plusieurs grandes villes. Les associés de Vistenza Vyatt tenaient à lancer des assauts punitifs, tandis que les conseillers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} suggéraient d'organiser une campagne de propagande planétaire visant à encourager les citoyens à dénoncer les traîtres aux autorités. Cependant, cette seconde approche nécessiterait que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} fasse preuve de générosité en utilisant ses fonds personnels.

languages.text: Ana isyancı kuvvetleri, uzak ve boz topraklarda saklanmakta olsa bile büyük şehirlerde azımsanamayacak sayıda isyancı varlığı olduğu tespit edildi. Vistenza Vyatt'ın müttefikleri, cezai baskınlar yapıma taraftarıydı. Lord Kaptan'ın danışmanlarıysa gezegen çapında bir sefer başlatmayı ve vatandaşlara tanıdıkları hainleri hemen yetkililere ihbar etmeleri için çağrıda bulunmayı teklif etti. Lakin ikinci öneri, Lord Kaptan'ın cömertlik ve iltimas sergileyerek kendi kişisel kaynaklarından feragat etmesini gerektiriyordu.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were in hiding in remote, uncultivated locations, but a substantial rebel network was exposed across major cities as well. Vistenza Vyatt's associates pressed for punitive raids, while the Lord Captain's advisors suggested rolling out a planet-wide propaganda campaign to urge citizens to expose the traitors in their ranks and report them to the authorities. The latter approach, however, would require the use of the Lord Captain's personal funds in a show of {mf|his|her} largesse and patronage.

Vistenza Vyatt'ın müttefikleri, cezai baskınlar yapıma taraftarıydı. Lord Kaptan'ın danışmanlarıysa gezegen çapında bir sefer başlatmayı ve vatandaşlara tanıdıkları hainleri hemen yetkililere ihbar etmeleri için çağrıda bulunmayı teklif etti. Lakin ikinci öneri, Lord Kaptan'ın cömertlik ve iltimas sergileyerek kendi kişisel kaynaklarından feragat etmesini gerektiriyordu.
